009package imagingbook.testutils;
010
011import static org.junit.Assert.assertNotNull;
012import static org.junit.Assert.assertTrue;
013
014import java.io.File;
015
016import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
017import imagingbook.core.resource.NamedResource;
018
019/**
020 * Static methods for testing implementations of {@link NamedResource} and {@link ImageResource}.
021 * This class is duplicated in various projects since it is only available during the
022 * test phase and thus not contained in any dependency JAR. 
023 * 
024 * @author WB
025 */
026public abstract class ResourceTestUtils {
027        
028        /**
029         * Scans all resources defined by some {@link NamedResource} class, validates that they exist.
030         */
031        public static <E extends Enum<E>> void testNamedResource(Class<E> enumClass) {
032                assertTrue("enum must implement NamedResource", NamedResource.class.isAssignableFrom(enumClass));
033                if (NamedResource.class.isAssignableFrom(enumClass)) {
034                        for (E item : enumClass.getEnumConstants()) {
035                                NamedResource res = (NamedResource) item;
036                                assertNotNull(res.getRelativePath());
037                                assertNotNull(new File(res.getRelativePath()));
038                                assertNotNull(res.getURL());
039                                assertNotNull("could not find resource " + item.toString(), res.getURL());
040                        }
041                                
042                }
043        }
044        
045        /**
046         * Scans all resources defined by some {@link ImageResource} class, validates that they can be opened
047         * as images.
048         */
049        public static <E extends Enum<E>> void testImageResource(Class<E> enumClass) {
050                assertTrue("enum must implement ImageResource", ImageResource.class.isAssignableFrom(enumClass));
051                if (ImageResource.class.isAssignableFrom(enumClass)) {
052                        for (E item : enumClass.getEnumConstants()) {
053                                ImageResource res = (ImageResource) item;
054                                assertNotNull(res.getRelativePath());
055                                File file = new File(res.getRelativePath());
056                                assertNotNull(file);
057                                assertNotNull(res.getURL());
058                                assertNotNull("could not find file " + file.getAbsolutePath(), res.getURL());
059                                assertNotNull("could not open image for resource " + res,  res.getImage());
060                        }
061                }
062        }
063
064}
